title: My Weather
description: Provide location, weather, humidity, wind, pressure, and a 5-day weather forecast. Integrated with Location API and Weather API.

title: My Quiz App
description: Allow user to take quizzes with the multiple categories. Developped with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and open quiz API

title: Feedback
description: A React web app to collect user feedback and service ratings. Use JSON server as backend.

title: Workout G.E.M.
description: An Android mobile app designed to support individuals in their fitness by tracking their workout.

title: Smart Food
description: An iOS mobile app allowing users to manage food in their fridge. Users can view, add, edit, and delete food item, and enable/disable expiry notification.
